## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                      | Type      | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `contentFloats` | `content-floats` | Content floats.                                  | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `openOnHover`   | `open-on-hover`  | Opens automatically when hovered (desktop only). | `boolean` | `undefined` |
